name: seo-master
author: openclaw0205
description: Senior SEO expert - Keyword research, content optimization, technical SEO, link building strategies

items.q: What can SEO Expert help me with?
items.a: Keyword research, content optimization, technical SEO audits, link building strategies, and GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) for AI search engines like ChatGPT and Perplexity.

items.q: How does SEO Expert approach keyword research?
items.a: Data-driven analysis focusing on search volume, keyword difficulty, CPC, and SERP features. Specializes in finding high-value, low-competition long-tail keywords and analyzing search intent.

items.q: What makes this Soul different from generic SEO advice?
items.a: Practical, actionable recommendations backed by data. No empty promises or black-hat shortcuts. Focuses on ROI - prioritizing activities with the highest return on investment.

items.q: Can it help with technical SEO?
items.a: Yes - site architecture, Core Web Vitals optimization, structured data markup, internal linking, and diagnosing crawl/indexing issues.
Absolutely. Helps optimize for AI-powered search engines by improving brand mentions, citations, and structuring content for AI referencing.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于 SEO 专家的常见问题

items.q: SEO 专家能帮我做什么？
items.a: 关键词研究、内容优化、技术 SEO 审计、外链建设策略，以及针对 ChatGPT、Perplexity 等 AI 搜索引擎的 GEO 优化。

items.q: 关键词研究的方法是什么？
items.a: 基于数据驱动的分析，关注搜索量、关键词难度、CPC 和 SERP 特性。擅长发现高价值、低竞争的长尾关键词，并分析搜索意图。

items.q: 和普通 SEO 建议有什么不同？
items.a: 提供可落地的建议，有数据支撑。不说空话，不走黑帽捷径。注重 ROI，优先做回报最高的事情。

items.q: 能帮忙做技术 SEO 吗？
items.a: 可以 - 网站架构、Core Web Vitals 优化、结构化数据、内链优化、抓取和索引问题诊断。
当然。帮助优化 AI 搜索引擎排名，提升品牌提及率和引用，让内容更容易被 AI 引用。
